website_summaries.verdict: These adult briefs are exceptionally absorbent and comfortable for the price. We recommend them for night use, since they can be bulky and noisy under daytime clothing.
pros: Strong adhesive on tabs for a  very secure fit
Stand-up leak guard and wetness indicator
cons: Fit is challenging for users with larger thighs

customer_reviews.title: Great Diapers...the Abri-Form M4 is the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Great diapers at a quality price. Very absorbent and one diaper will last me for 10-12 hours and up to 4-5 full wettings!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Stewart

customer_reviews.title: No More Leaks
customer_reviews.text: These work far better than any you will find at most stores. I have a bedwetter who (at 11and 12) was soaking through every brand of nighttime pull-ups we tried. These are more expensive but totally worth it when it comes to limiting the need to wash all bedding almost daily. Thankfully he has finally started having more dry nights. I have him wear underwear under the pull-ups and reuse them if they are not wet.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Oversized
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package so it is not returnable. The size of a medium was HUGE ! Doubt I could get a tight fit at the legs which was reason for selection of this product. Plan to donate remainder. Would be interested in others experience re size before I consider repurchase. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Indrani

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Good Stuff - ABENA M4 PLASTIC
customer_reviews.text: These guys are generally pricey, but when you can get a good deal on them, they are worth trying. I highly do not recommend their breathable version (sent mine back) as their construction does not seem to stand up. It's a real pain when applying and you have a tab and stuff attached to your hand because the material wasn't strong enough. I know a lot of people must like the fake-fabric stuff, for many reasons, but for me, fighting with getting them on, plus the leaking/weeping characteristic of that material makes me unenthusiastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Hick

customer_reviews.title: Work great for overnight use
customer_reviews.text: College bedwetter here, these work great and absorb a ton so no hidden surprises in the morning with wet sheets..they are bulky so note to self..wear loose clothing
customer_reviews.author: Beamerfan

customer_reviews.title: Great Diapers!! Ideal bowel containment if you don't want to sit on a toilet
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to diapers for going #2 in! I am a guy but I don't like sitting on a toilet to go #2 so I use the toilet to pee and diapers for going #2. What I like about these diapers is they have standing leak guards (a must if you use them for my reason) and a plastic backing which will minimize odors better than cloth-like backed diapers. Be sure you change your diaper immediately after using it (if you use them for going #2 in) and use baby wipes to get clean. 5 stars for my use!!!
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: There are none better.
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion there are no better adult diapers on the market for those dealing with moderate to heavy urinary incontinence. Although each brief costs around $1.30 I don’t need to use nearly as many throughout the day. I also feel more confident wearing these compared to many other brands I’ve tried over the years. I rarely have had issues with embarrassing leaks whereas your drug store brands like Depend, Prevail and others can sometimes leak after only one void if you deal with severe urge like incontinence.
customer_reviews.author: Scott  Wright

customer_reviews.title: What happened?  Tapes missing
customer_reviews.text: Normally these are OK but this bag I got from Amazon must be from the reject pile. Date code is 2015, and the upper left tape tab is missing the release liner, and the bottom left tab is mis-applied too and just rips apart the brief when opened the normal way (try to pull out the blue tab and watch what happens). You can use these just be prepared to come up with your own solution for the left side tapes, or don't try to use the blue release liner - if you can get to it just peel the white tape out and use that, but it's a one-time deal when it sticks on the brief.
customer_reviews.author: RustyNutz

customer_reviews.title: These work beautifully. Even though they crinkle (plastic backed
customer_reviews.text: These work beautifully. Even though they crinkle (plastic backed, can't avoid it) the level of comfort and capacity continue to amaze me. These are great for overnight use, or all day wear. I will mention that if you are borderline small/medium, pick this one. The medium is much more absorbent, and larger than the S4, and also conforms to a wide range of waist sizes. Thank you Abena, for your amazing diapers!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Only for the most unaware victims.
customer_reviews.text: Huge wrappers of absorbent tree pulp beneath a heat, humidity and sweat inducing near-Saran-Wrap outer covering that bulks up your package like John Holmes underwear. I think these will disappoint and upset most users, other than those who are blissfully unaware of the care and single use-then-throw-away costs and crotch rot experienced in such towering examples of WTF!
customer_reviews.author: Otto Bhan

customer_reviews.title: Waz very impressed with fit, price, and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat the price! Was previously buying the Little to Big Diapers because how thick, comfortable, and crinkely they were. The plastic backing was pretty close to the L to B brand also. They hold up well for ABDL fun. I havnt wet them yet, but if anything like the L to B brand im sold. I will still purchace the L to B brand for ABDL fun nights cuz, of the female n make prints. I will use my Abenas for my alone time.
customer_reviews.author: K.L.K

customer_reviews.title: Dry bed/dry PJs...Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Last night was 1st time using this product. My brother slept later than normal, when he got out of bed his PJs were dry, bed dry...WOOHOO! Diaper had absorbed everything and could have absorbed plenty more, as back half seemed dry still. This has not only improved my brother's life, but mine as well. Thank you for an excellent, life enhancing product. Hugging you from here.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but prone to leaking
customer_reviews.text: This diaper can hold 2-3 uses before its absorbancy cap is reached, and thats if you aren't someone who uses it heavily. It could take realistically one very heavy use before youd find yourself leaking. The leg guards are practically not existance, so even feces, if wet, can seep through the leg gathers. If you're looking for a good quality Medical diaper, Northshore might be a better option. IF you're looking for an ABDL diaper, ABU should have you covered.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: HOLY MOTHER OF DIAPERS
customer_reviews.text: The only diaper I will compare to this is the Northshore Supreme, which is more stiff and has a "lower" fit. I like this diaper because it's plastic and fits well. The M3 is HORRIBLE - the fabric on the M3 sucks and if you wet yourself, you'll smell piss. The M4 is a great product, I hope Abena keeps it around because it's the only product of their's that I'm willing to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbant
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different brands. This is the most comfortable and absorbent diaper I have come across.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Fit great!
customer_reviews.text: My 19 year old has an incredibly long pelvis and is fairly thin, so we've had nightmares trying to find a fit for her that was comfortable and didn't leak like crazy. These are perfect for her particular type of shape! They are high waisted and still slim enough that they don't have to be wrapped completely around to fit. The are also super absorbent!
customer_reviews.author: mysykt

customer_reviews.title: Good for daily use, but overall the product is lacking in several areas
customer_reviews.text: Urinary Incontinence, plastic outer shell will leak very easily, sitting down isn't really an option as i leaked in my first use. Absorbancy is pretty good. cheap outer shell and the tapes are fairly poor as well. I would go with the Cloth backed, but unfortunately Abena doesn't have cloth-backed available on Amazon in my area. (Southern California) Combined with unfortunately buying two bags of the plastic backed on accident and deciding to give them a shot is definitely a letdown.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Which you got more diapers, but I use these for my husband with a pair of plastic pants. He loves these, they’re more discreet, comfier and not so bulky that it’s hard for him to walk and sleep. He doesn’t fuss with these much, and he usually fusses with diapers period but these he handles well. He suffered a pretty serious stroke, after a head injury when he was twenty. Three years later, and he’s in diapers full time so these were definitely nice for him. I recommend them, especially for their comfort level.
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great diaper for the price paid. The thick padding provides comfort and protection. I have slept through the night without any issues. This diaper holds a lot of liquid before it starts to leak. It does make a noticeable crinkle when worn, but I find that part of the allure. The crinkle does diminish if you put pants on over it. I also like the simple print on the diaper. It kind of reminds me of the baby diapers from years ago, simpler times. I recommend the M4 if you have a need for it or just like wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob W

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these
customer_reviews.text: I hate these and accidentally ordered 4 more packages of them and now I’m SOL cuz you can’t return them even though I literally haven’t even opened the box. They’re horribly uncomfortable, they’re comically large, and they’re impossible to fasten correctly. Once you have the tabs on you cannot reposition it, so you better guess right the first time. They’re so awkward to put on, may be easier with two people. Seriously these are the worst I’m so mad I have so many of them.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Unreal absorbency
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review on behalf of a family relative, for whom this product was for. They are in their late 70s and, they loved it! There is no smell whatsoever, superior odor control, wetness indicator, and so many other perks. Definitely recommended. Spend the extra dollar and save a tremendous headache.
customer_reviews.author: Rubark Established 2014

customer_reviews.title: Read Carefully the Product description!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read far enough into the product description and I got the wrong ones! Really disappointed because the ones we have been using are awesome but this package has plastic backing instead of the non-woven fabric and they are hot and more likely to cause skin breakdown. We will use these but I will def be more careful next time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Product is great! Disappointed that the package was not discrete. Left at my apartments front door all day and I'm at the main entrance. Lucky it wasn't delivered to the front desk...
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Needs velcro tabs
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually trying to get these things on a moving target, so the fact that I can't reset the tabs is a big deal. Yes, I read the reviews so I wasn't surprised, but after three nights and still finding a wet husband every morning, we've gone back to Molicare and the velcro tabs...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No hook/loop tape.
customer_reviews.text: These do not have hook/loop tape, which is one of the main reason I purchased them; I wanted to be able to get a good fit. They come with simple tape tabs which do not reposition. The tape tears the plastic once you attach it. Very disappointed and probably won't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia F.

customer_reviews.title: Quite Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My preference is cloth and that is my choice around home, especially at night with extra doublers but these are one of the better disposables I've tried. Comfortable and relatively leak resistant but wouldn't satisfactory for side sleepers. My primary use is when I go out as they are less bulky than cloth and fit better under street clothes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hager

customer_reviews.title: Very dependable protection at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a bad tape on any of these diapers. They are very comfortable and breathable. I can go most of the day on a single one. Which is great for busy days and helps my fuels my independence. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Paddings very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: On most diaper's I am in-between a large and med but these work great for me, very absorbent usually protects all night long without inserts.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Best protection we have found!
customer_reviews.text: Best brief to get through the night. We use them when we want to sleep in or traveling and don't want to worry about changes. Though it's a little bulky and easily visible through clothing, and a bit pricy, it's worth it not to have to worry about him leaking or having to change it for 8-12 hours, especially when when we are sleeping, traveling, our going out.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this order. These diapers are suppose to be plastic backed and the ones I received today are not plastic backed at all. I don’t know if it’s because the packaging says premium but it’s definetly not the ones I always order. I ordered these based on the picture and that’s not what I received.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa E. Harrigan

customer_reviews.title: Learn how to count before shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I do not have a problem with the product. What I have a problem with is packaging and shipping. It stated 2 packages and I have only been getting 1 package. So someone can not read the instructions and can not count correctly. So if I ask for 2 packages per box. And add the quantity of 3 boxes. That equals a total of 6 packages to be sent not 3. Your shipping department needs to learn to count.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Renee Lunsford

customer_reviews.title: Don't get the hype... but I still like them.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why these are everyone's favorite. I can think of many that are much better but these are consistently rated among the best. They are good value for cost. The tapes are a little thin but work well. They are fairly discrete under regular clothes. I am 5'8" and about 240lbs with a 38 waste and wear medium size.
customer_reviews.author: mgm5790

customer_reviews.title: best brief on the market
customer_reviews.text: This brief is one of the best in my life, fits well, high absorbency, all throughout the night wear ability! I will continue to use abri forms the remainder of my life, these are a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: One of my Favorites
customer_reviews.text: These hold very well, are plastic backed, only issue is the they clump after a night in them unless you insert a booster and then they dont seem to clump and sag near as much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Use for my mom with Alzheimer’s. She’s tiny, 112 pounds. But we use the Med. They look huge but work great!!! We no longer have to wash the bedding every day, as they absorb so much. They’ a bit expensive but do a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbent diaper
customer_reviews.text: I wore this diaper for 8 hours and in that 8 hours I had drank 4 liters of pop and 4 bottles of water and had a mess and it contained the messes for 8 hours no leaks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great overall
customer_reviews.text: Only thing i don't like is that once the blue part of the tapes are placed, they are placed. If you try to remove them they rip the diaper. So your first fit, if you undo them to use a normal bathroom and wear for protection, has to be the fit. I wear for 16+ hours. They're great for the duration and are super absorbent. They're quiet, comfortable, and smell doesn't escape out.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: BEST adult diaper on the market today!
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, there is no better adult diaper on the market today. It is everything I could have imagined and more! It feels amazing, is very thick and crinkly, smells great and holds A LOT. It is a must-have diaper for any DL.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Ad is a bit misleading
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Abena products for some time. Always pull-on type. My most recent purchase was Abri-Form Comfort "Briefs". I mistook these for the pull on type. They are not, they are the wrap-around variety. I'm not sure I can use them, but don't want to stand the expense of return shipping. Abena makes a fine product, and I will continue to use them, I just want others to be aware to read the descriptions carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would have give zero stars
customer_reviews.text: They expand More than any product and are extremely uncomfortable leak Absolutely the worst. When I tried to return 2 unopened boxes they are not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: MommaZ123

customer_reviews.title: Love it, when they have ABDL and autism spectrum disorder
customer_reviews.text: That’s products is great diapers help people with autism spectrum disorder and ABDL fetishized to wear it. Maximum absorbing and soft as thick diaper. Pons: Put a diaper on with lie as perfect place. Cons: Put a diaper on with stand as messed up tapes.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Caudill

customer_reviews.title: Great out and about full usage and discrete
customer_reviews.text: This product is great I reallly love the indicator and this product soaks up quickly and absorbs Oder well. It doesn’t swell up like some other premium diapers great for full usage and still keeping your cover. Wore this at work plenty with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: The blue Dino

customer_reviews.title: Xtra Hold liquids
customer_reviews.text: These briefs were truly made for extra liquid holding. I will be buying more of these for my mom, since she is now incontinent. They save me having to add an extra pad into her waterproof briefs that I used to have to buy for that added protection. A real money saver in that regard. It also helps keep the under pad I use for the sheets and mattress protector dry, as before I had to change and wash daily.
customer_reviews.author: Yummy's Tiger78

customer_reviews.title: False description
customer_reviews.text: buyer beware - misleading product description: these are not briefs, they are diapers. Did not realize this until we opened the package. Company would not accept a return. Will not buy again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Scott

customer_reviews.title: ABDL
customer_reviews.text: Another one of my goto diapers this is mostly my day time diaper sometimes night. But they're pretty awesome for the money. You do run into the issue of the tabs stretching and ripping the front but my the time that usually happens it time for a change anyways. Definitely a good diaper and a good deal
customer_reviews.author: Matthew StGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Way way too big.... My mom didnt like at all. And it is way too hot to wear
customer_reviews.author: shih hsu (stacey)

customer_reviews.title: Excellent adult brief.
customer_reviews.text: As always, excellent quality & supreme comfort thanks to the brief staying in place thanks to it still having a plastic outer cover. These are incredibly absorbent and allow me a full nights' rest without worrying about waking up thanks to being in a cold, wet bed.
customer_reviews.author: KCB

customer_reviews.title: Impressive product
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed! I can't believe how absorbent these are! Only one for all evening night and morning. Zero leaks even. Tabs hold well and are refastenable. They are pretty thick so definitely show through clothing. Plastic backing is a bit noisey but it's a fair trade for the leak protection.
customer_reviews.author: Articfoxx

customer_reviews.title: Not for a mobile person.  Ordered medium, they were huge.
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would be more like the stretchy briefs of other brands. They looked really cheap and huge and would be hard to put on. Tabs don't help if they can't be taken on and off when needed since there is very little stretch. Can't evaluate Absorbency, leak protection since they are unusable. Maybe ok for someone who is bed ridden.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Very absorbing product. It does tend to leak if you have a heavy flow. Very bulky and obvious they are being worn. Have had several leaks out the sides and top. If being used at night combine with a mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Best brief for overnight
customer_reviews.text: Finally a brief that doesn't leak even with heavy wetting! I buy these for my son who suffers from night time bed wetting. This brief holds an incredible amount of urine, enough that he can sleep for 10 hours and still not leak!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Malakowsky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best diapers you can buy on the market for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Top shelf product
customer_reviews.text: The price is high but, if you're in need of a brief that must last through the night, this is the one to buy. I've purchased these for almost 10 years and never once have I had a leak, tear, or other defect.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Size is not true to what they say it is
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size for the size wasn’t that I have which is the m4 and got today and doesn’t not fit. So if your bigger than 36 order the l4’s.
customer_reviews.author: That one guy

customer_reviews.title: leakproof
customer_reviews.text: good overnight protection for protection. the caregiver for elderly man states the man cannot manage the sidetabs himself. Would be great if this product could be a pullup
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Insane absobency
customer_reviews.text: Worn these out in public and in cars with friends, never leaked even when very wet. They don't crinkle much and don't smell bad when wet, nobody knew I was wearing a diaper. These hold so much more than anything else I've worn.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: They work great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear underneath a dry suit while scuba diving. They're comfortable and work better than anything else I've tried. They're quite absorbent and don't leak so there's no rush to take them off after a dive. I like being able to wait for a convenient and discreet occasion to remove them.
customer_reviews.author: Nikola Edison

customer_reviews.title: for the confort
customer_reviews.text: is one of the betters diapers what i have been used when you are used for first time you feel litle bulky but in minutes you cant feel the confort of the m4
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: over night only
customer_reviews.text: These are good diapers for over night use. During the day they are just too thick for my mom. They have a plastic outer cover so they are warm and crinkly but that is just fine for laying in bed sleeping. My mom thinks they are too big but she hates the fact that she is dealing with this whole recovery from a stroke. I think these diapers are just the thing to prevent your beloved oldster from laying in a wet mass over night.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was absolutely terrible, was supposed to arrive on Friday...received it on Tuesday the following week. Also noted I haven't had this product in a couple years and it seems they are a but thinner and the pad is less dense and absorbent as previous.
customer_reviews.author: Just a guy

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding protection
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many other briefs on the market, and this one, hands down, is the best product out there for enuresis (bed wetting). I've been using these briefs for the past 6 years and not once have I ever had an issue with them. They will last an entire 12 hours without needing to be changed and hold an extraordinary amount of liquid. I recommend this product for anyone who requires extended protection for incontinence daytime/night time.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbent and dl will love this thicker diaper
customer_reviews.text: Great diaper I wear diapers day and night. Cloth diapers at night. Disposable diapers in the day. Heavy wetter .They are great.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: These Rock
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, they’re very very absorbent. They are also wonderful because you can adjust two sets of tabs to readjust the brief which makes for easy comfort.
customer_reviews.author: uwu

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these diapers for my bedridden mother. They work great for her in every way!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These are the greatest!! I have been washing bedding & having to shower my husband every morning for over a month. Have tried numerous under garments & nothing worked until now. FINALLY!!
customer_reviews.author: Christie L. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbant adult briefs
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best adult briefs! Really protects against wetness which could cause serious debicutus ulcers (bed sores). Glad to have this wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Tara E.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product does what it indicates on the package that it will do. Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Louder crinkle then expected
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting less “diaper crinkle”. Not a discrete day time diaper. Great overnight diaper. Holds everything quite well. No leaks.
customer_reviews.author: 0utd00r Wand3r3r

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Well made diaper, a bit thick but no leaks make me happier
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Edens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Likely the best plastic backed diaper on the market. Cost & quality are great
customer_reviews.author: Mike (Hopewell Va)

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper on the market
customer_reviews.text: These diapers are the best I have worn. Hands down the most comfortable fitting and the easiest to put on. The tabs attach and re-attach perfectly and the absorbency is perfect! I will buy these agian
customer_reviews.author: BearTale

customer_reviews.title: Leaky...
customer_reviews.text: Mostly, not all, but a large fraction of the package had product with little pinholes causing fluid to get into my pants and onto my bed. The whole point of getting these is to prevent that from happening... I've gotten these in the past and no issues, just this most recent order is what I'm not satisfied with.
customer_reviews.author: andrew steurer

customer_reviews.title: A ok in my book
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Great absorbency. Just a little stiff but I like softer diapers. Great for the price though and very reliable. Wouldn’t consider them discreet. But they’re great for nighttime.
customer_reviews.author: Whoisheisheyou

customer_reviews.title: Make Sure of Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Packaging says 28-43 waist but way to large for my Mom. Item can’t be returned. Waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: Silverfox

customer_reviews.title: Not studrdily made
customer_reviews.text: So trying these again, I've discovered that not only do the leg guards keep losing the elastic, the tapes barely stick, and even if they do, they just end up ripping off of the wings. Very disappointed and most likely will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the cushiest most absorbent strongest tapes On a plastic diaper best ab/dl diaper ever
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality diaper! I highly recommend these if you suffer from incontinence or if you're into ABDL. They're more comfortable then my regular underwear and very absorbent. I've not had any leaks since using it and for the price they're sold for you won't find a better diaper elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like the absorbency the amount these hold is great. And 2 day shipping love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: EMPTY BOX ARRIVED
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived EMPTY yup. A box. Taped up. Light as a feather. NOTHING INSIDE RV resort office watched me open it to reveal nothing inside Waiting to hear back from seller
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: can't go wrong for comfortable bladder reassurance
customer_reviews.text: Classic, absorbent and simple, can't go wrong for comfortable bladder reassurance
customer_reviews.author: Tyler E

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. But did NOT come in discrete packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous User

customer_reviews.title: Best Affordable Briefs
customer_reviews.text: Great for overnight use or for people with heavy incontinence. Came in a discreet box with nothing on the outside except the amazon logo. Very crinkly and loud
customer_reviews.author: FR3D

customer_reviews.title: Best diapers on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Best diapers ever!! Love everything about them they are super comfy and have a classic appeal to them. stay diapered my friend's! 🤙
customer_reviews.author: dylan martin

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.text: Always my go to diaper for heavy and long term wearing cases. It is comfortable when dry and doesn't expand too much when wet. The tapes are strong and it is thick enough to hold many wettings. It isn't very discreet because of the thickness and crinkle is generates. I have been using these diapers for years and it is always the highest quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best Diaper
customer_reviews.text: I have tired many different store branded diapers but these just change the game. They hold a lot and they are comfortable to wear even while wet. I prefer them over the Molicare which surprised me.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome diapers.
customer_reviews.text: Absorbency was great, held 2 full wettings. Tapes work very well for easy on/off application. Very comfortable to wear and great value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice. Fit very well and no leaks at night. Was very happy with them. Also have a double tape action. Just in case you need to tighten up. Once it's full of the yellow snow. It is very thick. I recommend this to people who love abdl or incontinence
customer_reviews.author: Jattack

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and hold quite a bit. I would highly recommend these for bed wetting and for times when a restroom may not be available for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing may vary on your needs
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Decent absorbency, they feel weird at first but it's not so bad. Very big size but that may vary on your size and needs. All in all I will gladly by this product again
customer_reviews.author: Jayne mook

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price with subscription
customer_reviews.text: One of the best adult diapers out there. They have good leak guards and I can trust them to do their job when I am out of the house, sleeping, or being active.
customer_reviews.author: Jarek

customer_reviews.title: Wider crotch
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be wider in crotch for all types incontinence and thicker for no need for doublers.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Catman

customer_reviews.title: The notorious M4 (XPlus)
customer_reviews.text: Good product, as with A lot of plastic back diapers, sometimes pinholes can happen. Very comfortable I would reorder without no second thought.
customer_reviews.author: Jray92

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I always enjoy these diapers! Great absorbency and a great fit for me as a truck driver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PRICE IS GOLD
customer_reviews.text: For Ageplayers or people who need them for the price this is what you will need
customer_reviews.author: PupKenzo

customer_reviews.title: Overall good.
customer_reviews.text: These are great as far as being able to hold without worry of leaks unlike most store brand incontience products but as far as durability they wear a little too much after they become wet and risk holes in the plastic covering. Would be great if they were a little more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Best Adult Diapers
customer_reviews.text: My mom (87) wears Abena overnight, so about 8 hours. We have tried many brands, but Abena is by far the most absorbent diapers. Having her dry is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza M

customer_reviews.title: Best so far
customer_reviews.text: Best product, I have used. Good fit and very absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Diaper
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend getting this diaper. It is super absorbent an super comfortable to wear all night as i wet the bed at night and some times i have accidents during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problem solved!
customer_reviews.text: First briefs we've found which keep the bed dry overnight, every night! Usage tip, when the need for privacy is important: I put it on my relative (incontinent elder with dementia) as she stands at the sink for support. Use the top tabs first to tighten around the waist, follow with the bottom tabs to pull up around the tush.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great in short stints.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: They've never leaked on me, they're not too thick, and they're almost silent, perfect for wearing to work. Cons: They dont hold as much as molicares, and the padding separates and clumps up when wet, making them uncomfortable after more than just 4 hours. So you either have to just deal with it, or change often. Also, they dont handle fecal incontinence as good as the molicares do.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

product_meta.title: Abena Abri-Form Comfort Briefs, Medium, M4, 14 Count
product_meta.description: Size:14 CountAbri Form Comfort offers a wide range of all-in-one briefs for moderate to heavy incontinence designed to give optimum leakage security for highly demanding situation.
feature_bullets: The Abena Abri-Form Comfort size M4 fits hips 27.5"-43"; Absorbs up to 122 fl oz
Optimal leakage protection provided by plastic-backing and soft, reliable leakage barriers extended right to the edge
High quality hook and loop tapes for optimal fit and easy repositioning
Unique Top Dry system providing a dry surface and rapid absorption
Excellent absorption provided by long cellulose fibres, super-absorbents and an additional core in the centre
